articles.author: Ramishah Maruf
articles.title: Amazon just cut 14,000 jobs, and it’s not done - CNN
articles.description: Amazon said it would cut 14,000 corporate staffers this year in a mass layoff aimed at readying the company for wide adoption of AI technology.
articles.content:
Amazon said it would cut 14,000 corporate staffers this year in a mass layoff aimed at readying the company for wide adoption of AI technology.
The company noted that it would be hiring in key areas… [+3554 chars]
